abstract: Agencies have seized on the potential in sites like Twitter and Facebook, but there were notable misfires that embarrassed blue-chip brands.
snippet: Agencies have seized on the potential in sites like Twitter and Facebook, but there were notable misfires that embarrassed blue-chip brands.
lead_paragraph: Staff members of The Times’s media news department are highlighting the most significant developments this year in the industries they cover.

headline.main: The Year in Media | Advertisers Discover Pitfalls in Social Media
